label: Build & Run
command: cargo build -p krnl --target krnl/x86_64-unknown-meerkat.json && qemu-system-x86_64 -m 8G -kernel target/x86_64-unknown-meerkat/debug/krnl -no-reboot -no-shutdown -s -d in_asm,int
cargo build -p krnl --target krnl/i386-unknown-meerkat.json && qemu-system-i386 -m 8G -kernel target/i386-unknown-meerkat/debug/krnl -no-reboot -no-shutdown -s -d in_asm,int
